channel.title: Server Crashes after 25-30 people join! help!
channel.description:
Hello,
Whenever I am running my server, and about 25-30 people join it crashes and in the runserver.bat box it says: (username) could not log on because the server is full! Now the problem isnt the, MaxConnections: ___ thing cuz my max connections are like 100000. So if any one else knows how to solve my problem please help. For example frugooscape can hold like 200 players!! PLEASE HELP!!!
Thanks
Peter[br][size=1]Posted on: January 24, 2007, 04:10:45 PM[/size][hr]please help?

item.title: Server Crashes after 25-30 people join! help!

@eclipse245 wrote:

yo read my post correctly…that is not my problem!!
